title: Avengers, Thor & Captain America: Official Index to the Marvel Universe Marvel Universe (2011) #14
description: The chronicle of the Marvel Universe continues its coverage of the Avengers (from 1999's AVENGERS #13) and Captain America (from both 2004's CAPTAIN AMERICA #24 and 1944's CAPTAIN AMERICA COMICS #43). Watch the Marvel universe's history unfold month by month as we provide synopses for dozens of individual comics, including back-up strips — introducing the characters, teams, places and equipment that appeared within with vital information about first appearances, where they last showed up and where they appeared next!
